item.title: Familiarity - friend or foe (part 2)
item.description: The first part of this post was not really meant to be a first part of, possibly, a longer series. Yet, I seem to have found another case where things that we know and ways how we work might be preventing us from finding other solutions, possibly better. Some time ago I joined a new project. I was supposed to start working on a new application that would, later on, be taken over by a team I was part of.
